data.content:
noun
or April Fool's Day
[singular] :April 1 celebrated as a day on which people play tricks on each other - called also All Fools' Day
A trick that is played on April Fools' Day is often called an April Fools' trick or April Fools' joke. A person who is tricked on April Fools' Day is sometimes called an April fool.
ngày đùa truyền thống (mồng một tháng tư)
